channel.title: firstwebsideofdunc
channel.description: Personal website of dunc featuring projects, travel updates, and more

item.title: Website Redesign: Modern UI Updates
item.description:
Major Website Redesign

I've completely redesigned the website with a modern UI, including:

  • New interactive world map showing my travels
  • Improved "Bing Chiling" voting system with social credit score
  • Dark mode support for better viewing experience
  • Responsive design for all devices
  • Added Strava integration to track my activities

Check out the new design and let me know what you think!

item.title: New Travel: Visited Japan
item.description:
Japan Trip 2024

Just returned from an amazing two-week trip to Japan! Visited Tokyo, Kyoto, and Osaka.

Highlights included:

  • Cherry blossom viewing in Kyoto
  • Exploring the bustling streets of Tokyo
  • Trying authentic Japanese cuisine
  • Visiting historic temples and shrines

Check out the updated world map to see all the countries I've visited so far!

item.title: Added RSS Feed Support
item.description:
Stay Updated with RSS

I've added RSS feed support to the website! Now you can subscribe and get automatic updates whenever new content is posted.

Benefits of using the RSS feed:

  • Get notified about new content automatically
  • Read updates in your favorite RSS reader
  • Never miss an update

Visit the RSS subscription page to learn how to subscribe.

item.title: Upcoming Travel Plans: South America
item.description:
Planning Trip to South America

I'm excited to announce my upcoming travel plans to South America later this year!

Countries on the itinerary:

  • Brazil - Rio de Janeiro and the Amazon
  • Argentina - Buenos Aires and Patagonia
  • Peru - Machu Picchu and Lima
  • Chile - Santiago and Torres del Paine

Stay tuned for updates as I prepare for this adventure!

item.title: New Testimonials Added
item.description:
New Testimonials from Friends

I've added several new testimonials from friends and colleagues to the website.

Thanks to everyone who contributed their kind words! It means a lot to me.

Check out the testimonials section to see what people are saying.
